concept.title: Important Disclaimer
concept.shortdesc: These are important disclaimers regarding the recipes used this guide.

conbody.p: If you are like me, and have a severe allergy to tree nuts, substitute the ingredient for something else. Some examples and ideas for alternatives that I use can be found under "Allergy Alternatives."
Warning: This recipe contains alcohol. Consumption of alcohol is illegal if you are under 21.
